Control Name: 6.4. Ensure that Network Security Group Flow Log retention period is 'greater than 90 days'
Control Statement: Network Security Group Flow Logs should be enabled and the retention period is set to greater than or equal to 90 days.

control_attributes.Control: 6.4. Ensure that Network Security Group Flow Log retention period is 'greater than 90 days'
control_attributes.description: Network Security Group Flow Logs should be enabled and the retention period is set to greater than or equal to 90 days.
